body_html: After fixing this issue. I wonder why it would be a good idea to have a CPU HalfTensor at all. Since HalfTensor is a subtype of Tensor, we would expect it to support the same interface as Tensor. However, the current implementation of HalfTensor does not allow such behaviour.

body: After fixing this issue. I wonder why it would be a good idea to have a CPU HalfTensor at all. Since HalfTensor is a subtype of Tensor, we would expect it to support the same interface as Tensor. However, the current implementation of HalfTensor does not allow such behaviour.
